original_title: Il se passe trop de choses
overview: The film is - as the poem that inspired it - a search of serenity. But with images teaming with life amongst humans, even when all seems quiet. Sound is always direct. Images caught on location. No dialogues or actors. We aim to suggest more with less : some might call it minimalist cinema, we call it cin√©ma fragile.
title: Il se passe trop de choses
